issue.title: Collisions fail depending on the number of entities in a world

content.raw: This turns out to be an issue with the default `maxNumContacts` parameter in DART, which is 1000 in v6.7.2. Increasing that to 10000 seems to solve the problem. We could expose this parameter in SDF but SDF already has a `max_contacts` tag which is defined as the maximum number of contacts allowed between two entities. I believe the `maxNumContacts` in DART refers to the total number of contacts in the world.
